Header: Authorities say cultivation of crops for export will double
Content: The Exports Agricultural Department of Sri Lanka states that cultivation of crops for exports will double by 2020. The Director General of the Ministry, Anura Rupasinghe stated that the cultivation lands will double with the spread of cultivation throughout 14 districts. Meanwhile,Â  55000 spices were exported in 2014, the revenue received was Rs.43000 million.
